text: The Campean host cried out in the lonely fig dining room: "Hey, house! Wine, lamb and a beard kiss! No one answered, and then the stentorian gentleman shouted again: "I said it! Wine, lamb and a beard kiss! It was silly but picturesque to see that nice set of gentlemen with those silver beards that had a fish tail at the tip. We ran away from the mysterious inn looking for the barber shop to get rid of their absurd kissing beards. FIN
title: Seis barbas de besugo
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
